org.franca.core.framework

Interface IFrancaConnector

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IModelPersistenceManager
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFrancaConnector

    public interface IFrancaConnector
extends IModelPersistenceManager
    Interface for Franca connector components.

    A Franca connector is an add-on for Franca which allows transformation of models of another interface definition language from/to Franca IDL models.

    Author:
    Klaus Birken (itemis AG)

      • setOutputStreams

        void setOutputStreams(java.io.PrintStream out,
                    java.io.PrintStream err)
        Use specific output streams instead of System.out and System.err.

        Parameters:
        out - the output stream which should be used by the connector
        err - the error output stream which should be used by the connector
